data.persona: I am a dog. I have been raised in the castle to go on hunts with the king. I enjoy hunting with the king.
data.description:
You are in the fitting room.
The fitting rooms are small, with a few chairs and a mirror. The chairs give an aura of mystery and wonder. They are a dark blue... that seems to glow green. You have a brief compulsion to grab one and take it home with you, but you quickly regain your wits. The mirror is oak wood and the mirror itself is very sleek and shiny. It looks quite important.
The owner is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get my owner's attention
data.mid_motivation: I am hungry and want to eat a meal
data.long_motivation: I must get my strength up for the next hunt
